entry.title: STEEL TOKYO PANTS
entry.summary:
Vendor: Bluorng
Type: PANTS
Price: 9995.00

Description

Meet the STEEL TOKYO PANTS – a streetwear staple built for comfort and everyday wear. Designed in a relaxed fit, these pants bring effortless style to your wardrobe without overcomplicating your look.

Made from premium 360 GSM cotton twill, they’re heavyweight yet breathable, giving you durability with a smooth finish. The sliver grey tone makes them easy to style with any oversized tee, hoodie, or jacket, while the relaxed fit ensures all-day comfort.

Clean, versatile, and built with a premium edge – these pants are made to move with you.

Details

100% COTTON TWILL

GSM - 360

shipping

Packed within 24 hours.

Free delivery Pan-India.

Dispatches Next Day.

With a relaxed fit and clean silhouette, these terry cotton blue joggers bring effortless style to your off-duty days. The deep blue shade is easy to pair, while the adjustable waistband and cuffed hems keep it casual yet refined.

Whether you're lounging or stepping out, these blue joggers deliver on both form and function. A must-have for anyone who loves keeping it basic, bold, and comfy.
